lines.text: The fire was close to that table... maybe it was the table that was supposed to burn away?
To hide evidence of some kind of magic?
...Well, if it was, the plan didn't work- looks like only a couple legs really burned through.
You can still see that empty magic circle.
...What if it wasn't empty? What if it had writing written in something that'd burn away really fast?
I'd expect some scorch marks on the surface of the table, then...
I dunno- there's flash powders that can burn away pretty quick without leaving a trace.
I've used them myself, back when I was practicing- easy cleanup.
That coulda been it- but didn't you say those class-locked wizards couldn't do other magic?
Well, no other spells- but there could've been some ritual for doing something other than getting spells.
Still, if that's the case- we've hit a dead end. That stuff's gone.
And... I think there's something else a little more obvious that <c=#FF00FF>burned up.</c>
